entities.description: A person who suffers from a crime or harmful act.
The type of relationship between the victim and the offender (e.g., Spouse, Child, Neighbor).
A person who commits a crime or harmful act.
A numerical value representing the count of cases in the dataset, unadjusted for any statistical weighting.
The percentage representation of frequencies out of the total cases.

relationships.description: Establishes the relationship type that exists between a victim and an offender.
Indicates the frequency of an entity being involved in the dataset.
Indicates the percentage representation of an entity in the dataset.
